overview: Three’s company is the mode of choice in Deeper’s newest collection of erotic vignettes. Gianna and Markus team up to calm Vina’s nerves. Eliza weaponizes Jackie’s obsession with her in an impromptu hookup with a stranger off the streets. Bunny finds a latent domme streak trained in August’s direction when her husband pushes his agenda on her. Finally, Joey’s quest for self-discovery leads her to expressions both submissive and dominant, the journey culminating in a wild ride for Mick as the twin sides fight for control. Each group finds a new high in the union of Three.
title: Three
